verses.verse: Hear <WH8085> this word <WH1697> that Jehovah <WH3068> hath spoken <WH1696> against you <WH1121>, O children of Israel <WH3478>, against the whole family <WH4940> which I brought up <WH5927> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, saying <WH559>,
You only have I known <WH3045> of all the families <WH4940> of the earth <WH127>: therefore I will visit <WH6485> upon you all your iniquities <WH5771>.
Shall two <WH8147> walk <WH3212> together <WH3162>, except <WH1115> they have agreed <WH3259>?
Will a lion <WH738> roar <WH7580> in the forest <WH3293>, when he hath no prey <WH2964>? will a young lion <WH3715> cry out <WH5414> of his den <WH4585>, if he have taken <WH3920> nothing <WH1115>?

Can a bird <WH6833> fall <WH5307> in a snare <WH6341> upon the earth <WH776>, where no gin <WH4170> is set for him <WH6341>? shall a snare spring up <WH5927> from the ground <WH127>, and have taken <WH3920> nothing at all <WH3920>?

Shall the trumpet <WH7782> be blown <WH8628> in a city <WH5892>, and the people <WH5971> not be afraid <WH2729>? shall evil <WH7451> befall a city <WH5892>, and Jehovah <WH3068> hath not done it <WH6213>?
Surely the Lord <WH136> Jehovah <WH3069> will do <WH6213> nothing <WH1697>, except he reveal his secret <WH5475> unto his servants <WH5650> the prophets <WH5030>.
The lion <WH738> hath roared <WH7580>; who will not <WH3808> fear <WH3372>? The Lord <WH136> Jehovah <WH3069> hath spoken <WH1696>; who can but prophesy <WH5012>?

Publish <WH8085> ye in the palaces <WH759> at Ashdod <WH795>, and in the palaces <WH759> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, and say <WH559>, Assemble <WH622> yourselves upon the mountains <WH2022> of Samaria <WH8111>, and behold <WH7200> what great <WH7227> tumults <WH4103> are therein <WH7130>, and what oppressions <WH6217> in the midst thereof <WH7130>.
For they know <WH3045> not to do <WH6213> right <WH5229>, saith <WH5002> Jehovah <WH3068>, who store <WH686> up violence <WH2555> and robbery <WH7701> in their palaces <WH759>.

Therefore thus saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> Jehovah <WH3069>: An adversary <WH6862> there shall be <WH5439>, even round about the land <WH776>; and he shall bring down <WH3381> thy strength <WH5797> from thee <WH759>, and thy palaces shall be plundered <WH962>.

Thus saith <WH559> Jehovah <WH3068>: As the shepherd <WH7462> rescueth out <WH5337> of the mouth <WH6310> of the lion <WH738> two <WH8147> legs <WH3767>, or a piece <WH915> of an ear <WH241>, so shall the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> be rescued <WH5337> that sit <WH3427> in Samaria <WH8111> in the corner <WH6285> of a couch <WH4296>, and on the silken cushions <WH1833> of a bed <WH4296>.
Hear <WH8085> ye <WH5749>, and testify against the house <WH1004> of Jacob <WH3290>, saith <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> Jehovah <WH3069>, the God <WH430> of hosts <WH6635>.

For in the day <WH3117> that I shall visit <WH6485> the transgressions <WH6588> of Israel <WH3478> upon him <WH6485>, I will also visit the altars <WH4196> of Beth-el <WH1008>; and the horns <WH7161> of the altar <WH4196> shall be cut off <WH1438>, and fall <WH5307> to the ground <WH776>.

And I will smite <WH5221> the winter <WH2779> - house <WH1004> with the summer <WH7019> - house <WH1004>; and the houses <WH1004> of ivory <WH8127> shall perish <WH6>, and the great <WH7227> houses <WH1004> shall have an end <WH5486>, saith <WH5002> Jehovah <WH3068>.
